title: PGA Tour Accuses LIV Golf of Interfering With Its Contracts
description: The PGA Tour filed a counterclaim against the breakaway, Saudi-backed LIV Golf series, which has accused the tour of antitrust violations.
dc:creator: Jesus Jiménez
media:description: The PGA Tour has countersued LIV Golf, which joined a lawsuit originally filed by Phil Mickelson and 10 other golfers.
